div.p: School will be closed through April 30, 2020, depending on state and federal guidelines. We will post new information to this location.

ul.li: CLOSED: District playgrounds, football/soccer fields and baseball/softball fields are all closed. The track is still open for walking/running.
No School, no activities, no practice March 17-May 31

li.a: Resolution-- Pandemic Response and Emergency Suspension of Policy
Wifi locations for Brandon and Rowley
Families First Coronavirus Response Act Notice

div.em: There are no upcoming events at this time.

p.img: Get the ICSD App! Available on the Google Play Store or the App Store on your iPhone.

p.span: Vision: Creating a climate in which individuals of the Independence Community School District will strive to become effective communicators, problem solvers, responsible citizens, and productive people.
Mission: Educating people to be life long learners and respectful, responsible citizens.
Communication is a key element in helping to ensure the success of your student in the ICSD. We encourage sharing of information between home and school.
